column2: Volvo Cars says begins XC60 production in China STOCKHOLM

column2: 'Big Hero 6' wins battle with 'Interstellar' to lead U.S. box officeUPDATE 1-'Big Hero 6' vanquishes 'Interstellar' to lead U.S. box office LOS ANGELES/NEW YORK
